name: Free Tier
description:
Unlock the world of AI with the Free Tier. Perfect for those just starting or looking for quick, essential AI interactions without the commitment.

Key Features:
- Full access to Deminji Suite
- A comprehensive set of AI tools
- YouTube Video Summarizer for quick content insights
- Support for multiple AI models

Ideal For:
- Beginners eager to explore AI technology
- Casual users seeking quick, easy AI interactions
- Budget-conscious professionals
- First-time explorers of AI tools

Best Suited For: Short, focused tasks that require essential AI capabilities. Whether you're a newbie or need a no-cost solution for simple tasks, the Free Tier is the perfect starting point.

Message Limit: 5 messages/requests every 4 hours.

name: 7-Day Trial
description:
Experience the full capabilities of our AI platform with a 7-day trial.

Features:
- Complete access to the Deminji Suite
- All AI models unlocked
- Unlimited video summarization
- Integration with our exclusive Discord community
- 24/7 support for immediate assistance

Ideal for:
- New AI enthusiasts
- Short-term research projects
- Exploring our AI platform
- Testing our comprehensive tools

name: Monthly Access
description:
Unlock premium AI capabilities with a monthly subscription.

Features:
- 30 days of comprehensive, unrestricted access
- Full access to the Deminji Suite with advanced tools
- All AI models unlocked for complete mastery
- Advanced video summarization for enhanced productivity
- Integration with our exclusive Discord community
- 24/7 premium support for continuous assistance

Tailored for:
- Long-term research projects
- Academic scholars & researchers
- Continuous learning environments & innovation
- Professionals seeking maximum flexibility and AI expertise
